page.title: 04SPORT/LEISURE
page.content: When we examined the map we discovered there are two large playing field areas and a park which has tennis courts,putting and bowling greens and football facilities. The playing fields near school are used by the children when at school for football,rounders and their own adventure playing.It is also quite a good bird watching area. The only indoor sports facilities are at the YMCA and may only be used if one is a member of their organisation.Various activities are arranged for youngsters. The children feel there is a great need for more indoor recreation although they appreciate that their immediate area is mainly industrial.
